msContents.summary: Account for bricks for building works at Philadelphia which were under the superintendence of Zenon; very large total of bricks in line 7

msItemStruct.note: Written along the fibers with 25 lines
On the back, across the fibers, a Demotic account, P.Dem.Zen. 22, of which only a few marks appear in the Col. fragment; this is unrelated to the text on the front which was written first

provenance.p: Purchased by Columbia University from M. Nahman through H.I. Bell, in July 1923; no. 14 (original no. IV 14) in Bell's inventory
